bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'canBeInChat'; ((_battleType == BattleTypes.CLUB_BATTLE) && VoiceChatState.enabled && !(isEnemyPlayer)) || ((_player.isInSameDivision && VoiceChatState.enabled) && ((_battleType == BattleTypes.RANDOM_BATTLE) || (_battleType == BattleTypes.COOPERATIVE_BATTLE) || (_battleType == BattleTypes.PVE_BATTLE)))

bind.name: action
bind.value: 'buttonClick'; 'sendEvaluation'; _isInPBS ? {type: EvaluationType.DENUNCIATION, topic: EvaluationTopic.BOT, accountDBID: _playerDbId, arenaId: _arenaId} : {type: EvaluationType.DENUNCIATION, topic: EvaluationTopic.BOT, nickname: _player.name, arenaId: _arenaId}

bind.name: action

bind.name: action
bind.value: 'buttonClick'; 'sendEvaluation'; _isInPBS ? {type: EvaluationType.PRAISE, topic: EvaluationTopic.CHAT, accountDBID: _playerDbId, arenaId: _arenaId} : {type: EvaluationType.PRAISE, topic: EvaluationTopic.CHAT, nickname: _player.name, arenaId: _arenaId}

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'playerCanBeInChat'; ((_battleType == BattleTypes.CLUB_BATTLE) && VoiceChatState.enabled) || ((_isInSameDivision && VoiceChatState.enabled) && ((_battleType == BattleTypes.RANDOM_BATTLE) || (_battleType == BattleTypes.COOPERATIVE_BATTLE) || (_battleType == BattleTypes.PVE_BATTLE)))

bind.name: gotoAndStop!
bind.value: _isEmptySlot ? ('empty_slot_' + _formationType) : isOtherDivision ? (isCommander ? 'player_ready_other_division_commander' : 'player_ready_other_division') : isInBattle && _isWardog ? ('player_in_battle_' + _formationType + '_merc') : isInBattle ? ('player_in_battle_' + _formationType) : _isWardog && isReady ? ('player_ready_' + _formationType + '_merc') : _isWardog && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType + '_merc') : isCommander && isReady ? ('commander_' + _formationType) : isCommander && !isReady ? ('commander_not_ready_' +_formationType) : !isCommander && isReady ? ('player_ready_' + _formationType) : !isCommander && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType) : 'empty_slot_division'

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'player'; { relation: relation, name: name, pureName: pureName, ttkStatus: ttkStatus, tkStatus: tkStatus, isInSameDivision: isInSameDivision, isDivisionCommander: isDivisionCommander, isInVoiceChat: playerVoiceChatEntity != null, isMuted: isMuted, inviteCooldown: inviteCooldown, division: division, isAlive: isAlive, invitationsEnabled: invitationsEnabled, inviteCooldownEnabled: inviteCooldownEnabled, isLeaver: isLeaver, id: playerId, mute: mute, isInSameDivisionOnStart: playerEntity.avatar.isInSameDivisionOnStart }
